title: hi i own several google minis, a google hub, and a pixel 2. i say "okay google" quite a few times everyday. however, my phone and my hub are both set up to response to "okay google", so that is exactly what is happening. i would like to change my phone to "hey google" so both devices don't respond, but i can remember how to change this. can you let me know the steps involved to change my pixel to respond to hey google instead of okay google.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
